subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The debate over race-day medication has focused on furosemide, a diuretic known as Lasix that has been used to treat racehorses since the 1970s.
snippet: The debate over race-day medication has focused on furosemide, a diuretic known as Lasix that has been used to treat racehorses since the 1970s.
